question.en: In what orientation should the camera be in, when I record my item?

answer.en: Please record your performance item in landscape orientation, rather than portait. This will ensure that the entire width of the screen is filled with video, so our brothers and sisters can enjoy your performance in full view :)
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e se uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: What resolution should my video be?

answer.en: We would greatly appreciate that videos are between 720 to 1080 in resolution. Videos that are shot in 4k may be too large to be streamed over Zoom.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e se uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: How many items can I provide and how long can an item be?

answer.en: Please provide one 5 minute video. If you would like, you may provide more than one item in your video.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e se uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: Is there a cutoff date for items to be submitted?

answer.en: Yes there is! The cutoff date for items to be submitted is ## September 2021.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e se uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: Will my item be shown on the night of the fiafia?

answer.en: We want to include as many of your performances as we can. Please send through your songs, dances, skits, poetry readings and other talents! We hope that many brothers and sisters will contribute to the evening.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e se uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: Can I do a live performance on the night?

answer.en: Unfortuntely, doing a live performance presents a few hurdles, like sound and video streaming quality. Please record your performance item and send it through instead, we thank you for your understanding!
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e se uso po o se tuafafine.
